biography.firstAppearance: (as Speedy) More Fun Comics # 73(Nov. 1941); (as Arsenal) The New Titans # 99 (July 1993); (as Red Arrow) Justice League of America Vol. 2 # 7 (May 2007)

work.base: The Hall & JLA Watchtower; New York City; formerly Titans Tower, Station Markovia, and Gabriel's Horn

connections.groupAffiliation: Titans, Justice League of America, formerly Outsiders, Teen Titans, Checkmate, Central Bureau of Investigations
connections.relatives: Roy William Harper, Sr. (father, deceased); Brave Bow (adoptive father, deceased); Oliver "Ollie" Queen (Green Arrow - adoptive father); Jim Harper (Guardian- great-uncle); Lian Harper (daughter), Vandal Savage (ancestor)
